name: Sea Simulator: Dolphin 3D
description:
Play as a dolphin and swim to explore underwater world with Sea Dolphin Survival Simulator! Swim over the sea, feed your dolphin with small fish and meet other aquatic animals! Enjoy underwater life with Sea Simulator: Dolphin 3D!

Great survival simulator! Dive into the sea as a dolphin – the most intelligent aquatic animal! Start fishing to get a meal or battle for your life against dangerous see animals such as killer whales, shark and more! Underwater world might be more dangerous then it seems… It’s inhabited be fierce sea creatures, which might attack you! Use your intelligence to stay alive with this survival simulator in 3D! Explore whole sea, search for small fish and plankton bringing up a dolphin with Sea Simulator: Dolphin 3Dr.

Enjoy amazing underwater views playing this dolphin simulator! Search for food to survive, start fishing or try to attack small sea creatures! Battle against dangerous sea animals like sharks and killer whales or hide deep to stay alive! Control a dolhin using finger pads swimming around the sea, try survival mode and have fun with Sea Simulator: Dolphin 3D. Don't let your dolphin get lost in the vast underwater!

Sea Simulator: Dolphin 3D features:

- Play as a dolphin – the most intelligent sea creature
- Meet other aquatic animals – make friends with them or battle against
- Dangerous sea creatures ready to attack – sharks, killer whales and more
- Survival mode
- Great underwater simulator in 3D

Try this amazing Sea Simulator: Dolphin 3D and join the underwater life! Swim the sea as a dolphin, avoid battling with aquatic predators such as sharks and killer whales and search for plankton and fish to grow up! The main goal of this survival simulator is to stay alive! Enjoy being a dolphin with this realistic Sea Simulator: Dolphin 3D in game! Explore underwater world and have fun!
